architecture_system_design.title: Architecture & System Design
questions: What is the complete dependency graph of all Heady services, showing which services depend on which others?
Create a comprehensive data flow diagram showing how data moves from user request through Headypromoter, HeadyBrain, HeadyCheck, HeadySoul, and back to the user.
What are all the possible execution paths through the Heady ecosystem, starting from a user query in Perplexity?
Document the complete lifecycle of an execution plan from creation to validation to execution to result storage.
What are the critical failure points in the system where a single component failure could cascade to system-wide issues?
How does the system handle version conflicts between different services running different API versions?
What is the order of initialization for all Heady components, and what dependencies must be satisfied at each step?
Create a complete sequence diagram showing the interaction between Headypromoter, HeadyCheck, HeadyRegistry, and HeadyBrain during orchestration.

service_specific.title: Service-Specific Questions
questions: What are all the endpoints that HeadySoul exposes, their expected inputs/outputs, and error handling behavior?
How does HeadyRegistry handle concurrent updates from multiple services trying to register or update nodes simultaneously?
What is the complete list of all nodes registered in HeadyRegistry with their roles, triggers, dependencies, and primary tools?
Document every workflow available in the system, including their slash commands, execution steps, and required permissions.
What validation rules does HeadyCheck enforce, in what order, and what are the consequences of each rule failing?
How does HeadyLens monitoring work across distributed services deployed on different platforms (Render, Colab, local)?
What is stored in HeadyMemory, how long is it retained, and what are the search/retrieval patterns?

error_handling_recovery.title: Error Handling & Recovery
questions: What happens when HeadyCheck validation fails but Headypromoter has already begun execution - is there rollback capability?
Document all error types that can occur in the system, their severity levels, and the appropriate response for each.
How does the system recover from HeadySoul being unreachable during mission scoring requests?
What is the fallback behavior when the primary execution path fails - are there secondary paths or graceful degradation?
How are transient failures distinguished from permanent failures, and what retry logic exists?

performance_scalability.title: Performance & Scalability
questions: What are the current performance bottlenecks in the orchestration pipeline, and where should optimization focus?
How many concurrent orchestrations can Headypromoter handle before performance degrades?
What is the memory footprint of HeadyRegistry when fully loaded with all nodes, workflows, tools, and services?
How does validation caching in HeadyCheck impact overall system performance - what is the cache hit rate target?
What happens when HeadySoul's FAISS index grows too large - is there index rotation or archival?

integration_interoperability.title: Integration & Interoperability
questions: How do external services (like GitHub MCP, Perplexity, etc.) authenticate and integrate with Heady services?
What is the protocol for adding a new service to the Heady ecosystem - what must be registered and where?
How does HeadyBuddy (Electron app) communicate with cloud services - what APIs does it call?
Document the complete OAuth/authentication flow for HeadyWeb accessing HeadyMCP services.
What environment variables must be configured for each service, and what are the acceptable value ranges?

configuration_deployment.title: Configuration & Deployment
questions: What is the complete deployment checklist for launching a new Heady service from development to production?
How are secrets managed across the Heady ecosystem - where are API keys, tokens, and credentials stored?
What Docker Compose configuration is needed to run the entire Heady stack locally for development?
Document all Cloudflare Workers in use, what they do, and how they integrate with other services.
What is the disaster recovery procedure if all services go down simultaneously?

monitoring_observability.title: Monitoring & Observability
questions: What metrics should be monitored for each service to ensure healthy operation?
How would you implement distributed tracing across all Heady services to track a single request end-to-end?
What logs should each service emit, in what format, and where should they be centralized?
Design a comprehensive alerting strategy - what conditions should trigger alerts and who should be notified?
How can you trace why a specific orchestration failed when it touches multiple services across different platforms?

testing_quality_assurance.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
questions: What integration tests should exist to validate the complete orchestration pipeline works correctly?
How do you test HeadyCheck's auto-correction logic to ensure it makes appropriate suggestions?
What smoke tests should run after each deployment to verify system health?
How can HeadySoul's mission scoring be tested to ensure alignment scores are accurate and meaningful?
What chaos engineering experiments would reveal weaknesses in the system's resilience?

data_state_management.title: Data & State Management
questions: Where is system state stored (in-memory, database, files), and what happens if that storage fails?
How is HeadyRegistry's state persisted - is it in JSON files, database, or in-memory only?
What data needs to be backed up, how often, and what is the restore procedure?
How does HeadyMemory handle data consistency when multiple services write to it simultaneously?
What happens to in-flight executions if Headypromoter restarts - are they recovered or lost?

security_compliance.title: Security & Compliance
questions: What attack vectors exist in the system, and what mitigations are in place?
How is user data protected as it flows through different Heady services?
What rate limiting exists to prevent abuse of service endpoints?
How are permissions enforced - can any node invoke any workflow, or are there access controls?
What audit trail exists to track who executed what and when?

advanced_workflows.title: Advanced Workflows
questions: How would you implement a multi-stage workflow that requires human approval between stages?
Can workflows be dynamically generated based on runtime conditions, or must they be pre-registered?
How do you handle long-running workflows that might take hours or days to complete?
What happens when a workflow needs to wait for an external event (webhook, API callback) before continuing?
How can workflows be composed - can one workflow invoke another, and how deep can nesting go?

questions: How does HeadySoul's semantic similarity model get updated or retrained with new data?
